Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Intravenous inoculation of 4 . 2 x 10 ( 10 ) to 7 . 8 x 10 ( 10 ) pyocin type 6 Pseudomonas organisms in monkeys given vincristine sulfate 4 days previously resulted in fatal infection in 11 of 14 monkeys , whereas none of four receiving Pseudomonas alone died .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease          |
|------------------|
| fatal infection   |
| infection in monkeys |

The paragraph describes the outcome of an experiment where monkeys were given intravenous inoculation of Pyocin type 6 Pseudomonas organisms, some of which had been given vincristine sulfate four days prior. The outcome was fatal infection in 11 out of 14 monkeys who had received the Pyocin type 6 Pseudomonas organisms after vincristine sulfate, while none of the four monkeys who received Pyocin type 6 Pseudomonas organisms alone died. Therefore, the diseases mentioned in the paragraph are "fatal infection" and "infection in monkeys".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease          |
|------------------|
| fatal infection   |

The paragraph describes the outcome of an experiment where monkeys were given intravenous inoculation of Pyocin type 6 Pseudomonas organisms. The outcome for 11 out of 14 monkeys who had received the Pyocin type 6 Pseudomonas organisms after being given vincristine sulfate four days prior was fatal infection. Therefore, the only disease mentioned in the paragraph is "fatal infection".
